Glor DI est cxio heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
Al Him aparten kingship de heavens ter! Li controls life death. Li est Omnipotent
Li est Alpha Omega. Li est Outermost des Innermost. Li est fully aware da all ajx
Li est Unu kre heavens ter 6 tag tiam assumed all auxtoritat. Li kon cxio enters into ter cxio ke ven gxi cxio ven cxiel cxio ke grimp into gxi. Li est vi wherever vi est DI est Seer DE CXIO VI do
Al Him aparten kingship de heavens ter! All materi controlled DI
Li merges nokt tag merges tag nokt. Li est fully aware da innermost thoughts
(Kred en DI His messenger don el ki Li bestowed vi! Those among vi kred don charity) ind great recompense
Why vi ne kred en DI when messenger invit vi est kred en your Lord Li pren pledge vi vi est believers
Li est Unu send His servant klar revelations en ord plumb vi darkness into light DI EST Compassionate towards VI Merciful

Why vi ne spend ig DI when DI posed all wealth heavens ter? Disting ripoz est those vi spend victory strive Ili ating greater rang than those spend victory strive Por each DI promes salvation! DI est Cognizant DE CXIO VI do
Who like would prunt DI prunt righteousness gxi multiplied him manifold end generous recompense
Tag ven when vi seg kred hom women their lights radiating ahead da them al their tuj. Bon news est yours ke tag vi hav gxarden flu streams Vi abide therein forever This est great triumf
Tag hypocrite hom women dir al those kred Placx allow us sorb kelk da your light Gxi dir Ir dors behind vi streb light barrier set them gate separates mercy inner flank retribution outer flank
Ili vok them Est ni ne vi? Ili respond Jes vi cheated your anim hezit dub igx misled wishful opini di judgment ven! Vi diverted el DI iluzi
Do hodiaux ne ransom pren vi nor el those disbelieved Your abode est fajr; gxi est your lord miserable abode
Gxi est temp those kred open up their kor di message truth revealed herein Ili ne est followers previous scriptures kor igx hard temp consequently many da them torn wicked
Kon ti DI revives land gxi mort! Ni tiel eksplik revelations vi vi kompren
Surely charitable hom women prunt DI prunt goodness. Ili ricev their rekompenc multiplied manifold ili ind generous recompense
Those kred en DI His messengers est saints martyrs Rezerv them their Lord est their rekompenc their light As por those disbelieved rejected our revelations ili incurred Infer

Kon this worldly life est ne plur than lud games kaj fanfaron vi hoarding de mon infan! Gxi est abund pluv produkt plant placx disbelievers! Tiam plant turn into useless fojn blov vent! En Hereafter tie est either severe retribution forgiveness el DI approval This worldly life est ne plur than temporary iluzi

Do vi race forgiveness your Lord Paradise whose width encompasses heaven ter. Gxi awaits those kred en DI His messengers. Such est di grace ti Li bestows whomever Li vol! DI est Possessor Infinite Grace
Anything okaz ter vi jam recorded eben creation. This est facil DI do
Tiel vi ne grieve anything vi miss nor est fier da anything Li bestowed vi. DI NE AM those est boastful FIER
Ili est stingy enjoin popol est stingy Unu turn tiam DI est Ricx des Praiseworthy

Ni send our messengers supported per klar proofs ni send down them scripture legx ke popol uphold justice Ni send down glad wherein tie est strength many benefits popol! All this en ord por DI disting those support Him His messengers sur faith. DI est Powerful Almighty
Ni send Noah Abraham ni granted their descendants prophethood scripture. Kelk da them direkt while many est wicked

Subsequent al them ni send our messengers. Ni send Jesus fil Mary ni don him Injeel (Gospel) ni ej kor de his followers kindness mercy. Ili invent hermitism ni neniam dekret them. All ni pet them do est uphold commandments aprob DI! Ili ne uphold message as ili hav. Consequently ni don those kred them their recompense while many da them est wicked
O vi kred vi reverence DI kred en His messenger. Li tiam grant vi double rekompenc el His mercy dot vi light direkt vi forgive vi! DI est Forgiver Merciful
Tiel followers previous scripture kon ti ili ne monopolized di mercy grace kaj ke all grace est di man. Li bestows gxi whomever Li vol. DI est Possessor Infinite Grace
